title: It's Friday The 13th.  Snoop, Mariah, Al Green, Closing Remarks and Have a Great Weekend!
itunes:title: It's Friday The 13th.  Snoop, Mariah, Al Green, Closing Remarks and Have a Great Weekend!
description:
Snoop Dogg stops by the show to talk new Gospel music. Mariah has bipolar disorder, Al Green celebrates his 72nd birthday, and Big Dog breaks down the reality and actuality of success and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
